Producer: Jeff Culotta, Robert Ben Garant, Thomas Lennon, Sean McKittrick, Peter Principato, Paul Young
Rating: R (Language|Graphic Nudity|Bloody Violence|Sexual Content|Some Drug Use)
Synopsis: After she and her husband (Rob Corddry) move into a haunted house, a woman (Leslie Bibb) gives birth to a demonic infant that wreaks havoc.
Title: Hell Baby
